member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.MustAutomaticallyCleanPostpaidZeroTransactions
member.summary: Regulates if this component should automatically clean post-paid supply transactions of zero value when they are detected.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.MustAutomaticallyAuthorizePostpaidFuellingOperations
member.summary: Regulates if this component should automatically authorize post-paid (unlimitted, without top limit) supply operations when they are detected. TRUE: authorizes automattically. FALSE: explicit authorization is required for this type of fuelling operations.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.MustAutomaticallyReconnectWhenLostConnectionDetected
member.summary:
Regulates if this component should automatically reconnect to petrol station controller (PSS FDC) when the loss of connection is detected.
TRUE: Will automatically reconnect, moving from connected to connecting. If it fails it will keep trying it until the configured maximum attemps is reached. Between attemps, the state will remain connecting, until it finally changes to connected or disconnected. All connection state changes will be notified by events. FALSE: Change to state disconnected will be notified. Explicit new connection or reconnection actions will be necessary to move into connected state again.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.MaximumMillisecondsInReconnectionOperationOfAttemptsList
member.summary: The list of milliseconds before consider unsuccessful an attempt in a re-connection operation context. Regulates the time to wait before consider unsuccessful an attempt of a re-connection operation. Regulates the maximum attemps to automatically re-try to re-connect when the connection with petrol station controller is lost, and its waiting times. Each of the items in the list represents the time to wait for each re-try chance to succeed. The total attempts to try a re-connection is represented by this list size.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.MillisecondsInReconnectionOperationBetweenAttemptsList
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of milliseconds between automatic attempts in a reconnect operation context Each position of this list is the time to wait since the end of an attempt until the start of the next attempt (if it exists). i.e: first position of this list will be the time to wait since the first attempt ends until the second begins, second position of this list will be the time to wait since the second attemp ends until the third begins, and so on..

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.MaximumMillisecondsInConnectionOperationOfAttemptsList
member.summary: The list of milliseconds before consider unsuccessful an attempt in a connection operation context. Regulates the time to wait before consider unsuccessful an attempt of a connection operation. Regulates the maximum attemps to automatically try to connect to petrol station controller, and its waiting times. Each of the items in the list represents the time to wait for each connection try chance to succeed. The total attempts to try a connection is represented by this list size.

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.MillisecondsInConnectionOperationBetweenAttemptsList
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of milliseconds between automatic attempts in a connection operation context Each position of this list is the time to wait since the end of an attempt until the start of the next attempt (if it exists). i.e: first position of this list will be the time to wait since the first attempt ends until the second begins, second position of this list will be the time to wait since the second attemp ends until the third begins, and so on..

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.SupportedPostpaidPetrolStationControllerRawServiceModeIdList
member.summary:
Regulates the raw identificators of service modes configured in petrol station controller that means post-paid modes and are to be taken into consideration. If at a given time a service mode is encountered an is not covered by this list, will be ignored by post-paid logic.
Supports specific identificators or patterns including X (case-insensitive) as wildcard (i.e: 1X)(i.e: abXc)

member.name: P:HubblePOS.Connector.FDC.Wayne.WayneConnectorBC.SupportedPrepaidPetrolStationControllerRawServiceModeIdList
member.summary:
Regulates the raw identificators of service modes configured in petrol station controller that means pre-paid modes and are to be taken into consideration. If at a given time a service mode is encountered an is not covered by this list, will be ignored by pre-paid logic.
Supports specific identificators or patterns including X (case-insensitive) as wildcard (i.e: 2X)(i.e: abXc)
